title: Wasn't any of the 154 mass shootings in 2018 committed by a black man, an illegal alien, or a woman?
subtitle: His Facebook page, an extremist, gave readers an incomplete picture of the mass shooting in America in 2018.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: Of the 154 collective shootings recorded in the United States from 2018 to 28 June, none were perpetrated by black men, undocumented migrants or women.
